Paint.Tools
Interface ToolIF

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener, org.eclipse.swt.events.MouseListener, org.eclipse.swt.events.MouseMoveListener, org.eclipse.swt.internal.SWTEventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTool, MoveTool
public interface ToolIF
extends org.eclipse.swt.events.MouseListener, org.eclipse.swt.events.MouseMoveListener

the tool interface that defines the desired to be implemented behavior

Author:
Mostafa Eweda & Mohammed Abd El Salam
See Also:
MouseListener, MouseMoveListener
